level.text: The following fees shall be charged for conversion applications, certifications, and applications for registration of condominiums.
Application to convert a vacant housing accommodation: one hundred dollars ($100);
Application to convert a non-housing accommodation: one hundred dollars ($100);
Application to convert a property to a low income equity share cooperative: one hundred dollars ($100); and
Certification fee: one hundred dollars ($100) per occupied units or eight hundred dollars ($800), whichever is greater.
Source: Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Act of 2010, effective September 24, 2010 (D.C. Law 18-223), published at 57 DCR 6242, 6290 (July 23, 2010).
